attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Build a purpose built Accommodation block - bed, bathroom facilities, Internet access and other facilities to allow MPs to stay in London Overnight, do their job be refreshed and serve those who put them there without any personal benefit - being an MP is a Job, so a comfortable yet sensible solution saves the tax payer year on year.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
